summary: The Susan Muffley Act of 2025 aims to increase the benefits for certain pension plan beneficiaries. It mandates recalculation of benefits for eligible participants and beneficiaries under covered plans, ensuring they receive their full vested plan benefits. The bill also provides for lump-sum payments to make up for past underpayments. It establishes a trust fund to finance the increased benefits. Finally, it outlines regulations and tax treatment related to the payments.
